metadata.dc:author: Silva Abuín, J M
Gómez Zancajo, V R
Pérez-Castro Ellendt, E
Pertusa Peña, C
Mancebo Gómez, J M
Martínez-Piñeiro, J A
metadata.dc:description: A review is made of nine cases of priapism, seven of which were idiopathic and two secondary. The different etiological and clinical aspects are analyzed. All the patients underwent surgical treatment, with 42.8% of good, long-term results and the authors always recommend aggressive and early, surgical treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Priapismo: análisis y resultados del tratamiento quirúrgico en nueve casos.
[Priapism: analysis and results of surgical treatment in 9 cases].
